This is an Atom formatted XML site feed. It is intended to be viewed in a Newsreader. Alternatively you can view the HTML archives at https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS.
LISTSERV Web Interface 2.4.1 2015-01-21T14:35:30Z James Turner 2015-01-21T14:35:27+00:00 2015-01-21T14:35:27+00:00 turningpoint tab enabled on powerpoint https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;11ab5c6c.1501 hi<br>has anyone successfully enabled all staff account to have the turningpoint tab automatically appear as part of powerpoint. we are interested in skipping the need to open turningpoint dashboard in order to access the functionality of the tool.<br>many thanks<br><br>jim David Lockwood 2014-12-16T14:32:48+00:00 2014-12-16T14:32:48+00:00 Re: responseware authentication https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;87ae9bbd.1412 Hi Jim<br><br>Related issues discussed at a user group meeting were (a) the lack of mobile signals in many of our lecture halls, and/or (b) lack of "space" (IPs) on WiFi routers for larger groups.<br><br>David<br><br>> -----Original Message-----<br>> From: Discussion list for enhancing learning via electronic voting systems<br>> [mailto:ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK] On Behalf Of<br>> James Turner<br>> Sent: 16 December 2014 13:26<br>> To: ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS@JISCMAIL.AC.UK<br>> Subject: responseware authentication<br>><br>> Hi<br>> we are running a turningpoint mobile responseware evaluation.<br>> I was wondering if anyone had been down this route and would share any<br>> issues [...] James Turner 2014-12-16T13:25:56+00:00 2014-12-16T13:25:56+00:00 responseware authentication https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;973985ca.1412 Hi<br>we are running a turningpoint mobile responseware evaluation.<br>I was wondering if anyone had been down this route and would share any issues and solutions<br>many thanks<br>jim LJMU Nicholas Bowskill 2014-09-17T14:19:36+01:00 2014-09-17T14:19:36+01:00 SharedThinking Workshops https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;8cd0106d.1409 Hi Everyone,<br>Listed below are two workshops currently available and of possible interest<br>to people on this list. The workshops make unconventional use of classroom<br>technologies for particular applications. You are welcome to book online or<br>booking forms attached to be invoiced later. They are:<br><br>Student-Generated Induction, York, Oct 15th http://bit.ly/1q7ahJR<br>From transmission to group-learning<br><br>Group-Situated Reflective Practice, London, October 8th<br>http://bit.ly/1rFruFR<br>From metacognition to social metacognition [...] Jisc Netskills 2014-06-05T11:14:20+01:00 2014-06-05T11:14:20+01:00 Last Chance to Book - Podcasting A Practical Guide https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;52817a8c.1406 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;52817a8c.1406">Last Chance to Book - Podcasting A Practical Guide </a> Jisc Netskills 2014-05-19T15:53:12+01:00 2014-05-19T15:53:12+01:00 Google Analytics with Netskills https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;aa63f5d0.1405 Full message available at: <a href="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;aa63f5d0.1405">Google Analytics with Netskills </a> Jisc Netskills 2014-04-16T12:55:55+01:00 2014-04-16T12:55:55+01:00 Netskills Writing for the Web in Newcastle & London https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=ELECTRONIC-VOTING-SYSTEMS;97483e8c.1404 Tighten up your text and tweak your sentences into information-packed titles!
